mapper.select: select l.id as id, l.name as name, l.begin_date as begin_date, l.end_date as end_date, l.done, l.id_sport from intramurudes.league l
select l.id as id, l.name as name, l.begin_date as begin_date, l.end_date as end_date, l.done, l.id_sport from intramurudes.league l where id = #{id}
select l.id as id, l.name as name, l.begin_date as begin_date, l.end_date as end_date, l.done, l.id_sport from intramurudes.league l where id_sport = #{id_sport}
mapper.insert: insert into intramurudes.league(name, begin_date, end_date, done, id_sport) values (#{league.name}, #{league.beginDate}, #{league.endDate}, #{league.done}, #{league.idSport});
